trans-unit.source: Provides programmatic access to the section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 提供以编程方式访问配置文件的部分。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The PagesSection class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the configuration file section.
trans-unit.target: PagesSection 类使您能够以编程方式访问和修改配置文件节的内容。

trans-unit.source: This configuration section supports setting certain ASP.NET page and control directives globally for all pages and controls in the scope of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 此配置节支持的配置文件的作用域中设置全局范围内的所有页面和控件某些 ASP.NET 页面和控件指令。

trans-unit.source: This includes the `@ Page` directive, the `@ Import` directive through the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.Namespaces%2A> collection property, and the `@ Register` directive through the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.Controls%2A> collection property.
trans-unit.target: 这包括`@ Page`指令，`@ Import`指令通过<xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.Namespaces%2A>集合属性，与`@ Register`指令通过<xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.Controls%2A>集合属性。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.Namespaces%2A>

trans-unit.source: It also provides support for mapping tag types to other tag types at run time through the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.TagMapping%2A> collection property.
trans-unit.target: 它还提供对在运行时通过将标记类型映射到其他标记类型的支持<xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.TagMapping%2A>集合属性。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection.TagMapping%2A>

trans-unit.source: Directives specify settings used by the page and user-control compilers when they process ASP.NET Web Forms page (.aspx) and user control (.ascx) files.
trans-unit.target: 指令指定在处理 ASP.NET Web 窗体页面 (.aspx) 和用户控件 (.ascx) 文件时使用的页和用户控件的编译器设置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection"></xref> class using default settings.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection"></xref>类使用默认设置。

trans-unit.source: The PagesSection constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: PagesSection 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例<xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection>类通过<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法。</xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of seconds to wait for an asynchronous handler to complete during asynchronous page processing.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值为异步页处理期间完成的异步处理程序等待的秒数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 45 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 45 秒。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> value indicating the amount of time in seconds to wait for an asynchronous handler to complete during asynchronous page processing.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，该值指示的时间以秒为单位等待异步页处理期间完成的异步处理程序。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether events for ASP.NET pages are automatically connected to event-handling functions.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 页的事件将自动连接到事件处理函数。

trans-unit.source: When AutoEventWireup is `true`, ASP.NET does not require that you explicitly bind event handlers to a page event such as <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>.
trans-unit.target: AutoEventWireup 时`true`，ASP.NET 不需要显式将事件处理程序绑定到如<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>页事件

trans-unit.source: When AutoEventWireup is `false`, you must explicitly bind the event to a method.
trans-unit.target: AutoEventWireup 时`false`，必须显式将该事件绑定到方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a `Page_Load` method in the code for a page, the method will be called in response to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event only if you write code like that in the following example (notice the `Handles` statement in Visual Basic and the event handler code in C#): ```vb# Partial Class AutoEventWireupExample Inherits System.Web.UI.Page Protected Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load Response.Write("Executing Page_Load") End Sub End Class ``` ```c# public partial class AutoEventWireupExample : System.Web.UI.Page { protected void Page_Load(object sender, System.EventArgs e) { Response.Write("Executing Page_Load"); } override protected void OnInit(EventArgs e) { this.Load += new System.EventHandler(this.Page_Load); } } ``` When AutoEventWireup is `true`, handlers are automatically bound to events at run time based on their name and signature.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有`Page_Load`在代码页的方法，该方法将调用以响应<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件仅当你在编写代码类似的下面的示例 (请注意`Handles`Visual Basic 和 C# 中的事件处理程序代码中的语句): ```vb# Partial Class AutoEventWireupExample Inherits System.Web.UI.Page Protected Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load Response.Write("Executing Page_Load") End Sub End Class ``` ```c# public partial class AutoEventWireupExample : System.Web.UI.Page { protected void Page_Load(object sender, System.EventArgs e) { Response.Write("Executing Page_Load"); } override protected void OnInit(EventArgs e) { this.Load += new System.EventHandler(this.Page_Load); } } ```时 AutoEventWireup 是`true`，处理程序会自动绑定到事件在运行时根据其名称和签名。 </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>

trans-unit.source: For each event, ASP.NET searches for a method that is named according to the pattern `Page_`*eventname*, such as `Page_Load` or `Page_Init`.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个事件，ASP.NET 将搜索按照的模式命名的方法`Page_` *eventname*，如`Page_Load`或`Page_Init`。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET checks first for an overload that has the typical event-handler signature (that is, it specifies <xref:System.Object> and <xref:System.EventArgs> parameters).
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 会首先检查重载具有典型的事件处理程序签名 (即，它指定<xref:System.Object>和<xref:System.EventArgs>参数)。</xref:System.EventArgs> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If an event handler with this signature is not found, ASP.NET checks for an overload that has no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到事件处理程序使用此签名，ASP.NET 将检查没有参数的重载。

trans-unit.source: When AutoEventWireup is `false`, you must explicitly bind event handlers to events, as shown in the preceding example.
trans-unit.target: AutoEventWireup 时`false`，必须显式将绑定事件处理程序的事件，如前面的示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the method names do not have to follow a pattern.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，不需要的方法名称遵循模式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true` if AutoEventWireup is not specified in the `@ Page` directive.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`true`如果中未指定 AutoEventWireup`@ Page`指令。

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio automatically includes the attribute when it creates code-behind files.
trans-unit.target: 创建代码隐藏文件时，visual Studio 将自动包含该属性。

trans-unit.source: For ASP.NET pages written in C#, Visual Studio sets the value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 对于用 C# 编写的 ASP.NET 页，Visual Studio 将值设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: For Visual Basic, Visual Studio sets the value to `false` because handlers are bound to events by using the keyword, which is inserted automatically by Visual Studio when it generates an event handler.
trans-unit.target: 对于 Visual Basic，Visual Studio 将值设置为`false`因为处理程序会通过使用关键字由 Visual Studio 自动插入，在它生成一个事件处理程序绑定到事件。

trans-unit.source: If you set AutoEventWireup to `true`, you can omit (or remove) the keyword.
trans-unit.target: 如果 AutoEventWireup 设置为`true`，你可以省略 （或删除） 关键字。

trans-unit.source: Do not set AutoEventWireup to `true` if performance is a key consideration.
trans-unit.target: 未设置为 AutoEventWireup`true`如果性能是关键的考虑事项。

trans-unit.source: When automatic event wireup is enabled, ASP.NET must make between 15 and 30 tries to match events with methods.
trans-unit.target: 启用自动事件连接后，必须在 15 到 30 尝试与方法匹配事件之间进行 ASP.NET。

trans-unit.source: Note the following about binding event handlers to events: - If you set AutoEventWireup to `true`, make sure that you do not also manually attach page event handlers to events.
trans-unit.target: 请注意下列有关绑定到事件的事件处理程序:-如果 AutoEventWireup 设置为`true`，请确保，你不可以手动附加页事件处理程序到事件。

trans-unit.source: If you do, handlers might be called more than one time.
trans-unit.target: 如果这样做，则可能会不止一次调用处理程序。

trans-unit.source: - Automatic binding is performed only for page events, not for events for controls on the page.
trans-unit.target: 的仅对不用于页上的控件的事件的页事件执行自动绑定。

trans-unit.source: - As an alternative to binding events to handlers, you can override the `On`*eventname* methods of the page or of controls.
trans-unit.target: -为绑定事件写入处理程序的替代方法，您可以重写`On` *eventname*方法或控件的页面。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if events for ASP.NET pages are automatically connected to event-handling functions; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 ASP.NET 页的事件将自动连接到事件处理函数;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether .aspx pages and .ascx controls use response buffering.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定.aspx 页和.ascx 控件是否使用响应缓冲。

trans-unit.source: When response buffering is turned on, the page or control output is buffered until after the entire page or control is processed.
trans-unit.target: 启用响应缓冲后，页或控件输出进行缓冲直到整个页面或处理控件。

trans-unit.source: Do not set Buffer to `true` if performance is a key consideration.
trans-unit.target: 未设置为缓冲区`true`如果性能是关键的考虑事项。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if .aspx pages and .ascx controls use response buffering; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果.aspx 页和.ascx 控件使用响应缓冲;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default algorithm that is used to generate a control's identifier.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于生成控件的标识符的默认算法。

trans-unit.source: You use the ClientIDMode property to set the default value for a whole Web site.
trans-unit.target: ClientIDMode 属性用于设置整个网站的默认值。

trans-unit.source: You can override this value for an individual Web page or for individual controls.
trans-unit.target: 您可以替代此值对于单个网页或单独的控件。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates how the value in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is generated.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指示如何中的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>生成属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how .aspx pages and .ascx controls are compiled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，确定如何编译.aspx 页和.ascx 控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Web.UI.CompilationMode>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Web.UI.CompilationMode>。</xref:System.Web.UI.CompilationMode>

trans-unit.source: One of the values for the CompilationMode property, which specifies how .aspx pages and .ascx controls are compiled.
trans-unit.target: CompilationMode 属性，用于指定如何编译.aspx 页和.ascx 控件的值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the ASP.NET version that any rendered HTML will be compatible with.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定任何呈现 HTML ASP.NET 版本将与兼容。

trans-unit.source: This value is set by the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute of the `pages` element in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 此值将由`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`属性`pages`Web.config 文件中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is the default value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值是默认值为<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For information about how it is used, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET version that any rendered HTML will be compatible with.
trans-unit.target: 任何呈现 HTML ASP.NET 版本将与兼容。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将此属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixInfo"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixInfo"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixInfo> objects correspond to the `@ Register` directive on an ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixInfo>对象对应于`@ Register`指令将 ASP.NET 页上。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixInfo>

trans-unit.source: The `@ Register` directive allows you to specify the tag prefix for a user control.
trans-unit.target: `@ Register`指令允许您指定用户控件的标记前缀。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixCollection"></xref> of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixInfo"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixCollection"></xref> of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixInfo"></xref> objects.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether event validation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否启用事件验证。

trans-unit.source: The EnableEventValidation attribute indicates whether event validation should be performed.
trans-unit.target: EnableEventValidation 属性指示是否应执行事件验证。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: A Web application can optionally disable event validation to revert to .NET Framework version 1.0 behavior.
trans-unit.target: Web 应用程序可以 （可选） 禁用事件验证还原为.NET Framework 1.0 版行为。

trans-unit.source: The base control checks this attribute to determine whether it should validate events.
trans-unit.target: 基本控件将检查此特性，以确定它是否应验证事件。

trans-unit.source: A derived control does not inherit this base control attribute, and so it is exempt from event validation by default.
trans-unit.target: 派生的控件不会继承此基控件属性，并因此情况下不从默认的事件验证。

trans-unit.source: You still instruct ASP.NET to perform event validation on the derived control by adding the EnableEventValidation attribute to the derived control itself and setting it to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 你仍可以指示 ASP.NET 可以通过将 EnableEventValidation 特性添加到派生控件本身并将它设置为派生的控件上执行事件验证`true`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Event validation reduces the risk of unauthorized postback requests and callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 事件验证降低了未经授权的回发请求和回调的风险。

trans-unit.source: It instructs ASP.NET to validate only those events that can be raised in the control during a postback request or callback.
trans-unit.target: 它指示 ASP.NET 进行验证仅在回发请求或回调过程可以在控件中引发这些事件。

trans-unit.source: With this model, a control registers its events during rendering and then validates the events during the post-back or callback handling.
trans-unit.target: 与此模型中，控件在呈现期间注册其事件，然后在回发或回调处理过程中验证事件。

trans-unit.source: All event-driven controls in ASP.NET use this feature by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在 ASP.NET 中的所有事件驱动控件都使用此功能。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if event validation is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件验证已启用;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the session state is enabled, disabled, or read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定的会话状态是否已启用、 禁用还是只读的。

trans-unit.source: One of the values for the EnableSessionState property, which specifies whether the session state is enabled, disabled, or read-only.
trans-unit.target: EnableSessionState 属性，用于指定会话状态是否已启用、 禁用还是只读的值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.PagesEnableSessionState"></xref>, which indicates that session state is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.PagesEnableSessionState"> </xref>，指示该会话状态已启用。

trans-unit.source: The value is not a valid <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.PagesEnableSessionState"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 值不是有效<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.PagesEnableSessionState"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether view state is enabled or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值是启用还是禁用视图状态。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if view state is enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if view state is disabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果启用了视图状态;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果禁用了视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether ASP.NET should run a message authentication code (MAC) on the page's view state when the page is posted back from the client.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定 ASP.NET 是否应运行消息验证代码 (MAC) 上页面的视图状态，当从客户端回发页面时。

trans-unit.source: A view-state MAC is an encrypted version of the hidden variable that a page's view state is persisted to when the page is sent to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态 MAC 是变量的隐藏页发送到浏览器时，将页面的视图状态保存到的加密的版本。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the encrypted view state is checked to verify that it has not been tampered with on the client.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，加密的视图状态会检查以验证它的客户端上不被篡改。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This attribute should never be set to `false` in a production Web site, even if the application or page does not use view state.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 此属性应永远不会设置为`false`生产 Web 站点，即使该应用程序或页不使用视图状态中。

trans-unit.source: The view state MAC helps ensure the security of other ASP.NET functions in addition to the view state.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态 MAC 有助于确保 ASP.NET 函数除了的视图状态中的安全。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if ASP.NET should run a message authentication code (MAC) on the page's view state when the page is posted back from the client; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 ASP.NET 时应运行消息验证代码 (MAC) 上页面的视图状态从客户端，则回发页面否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of device tags that ASP.NET should ignore when it renders a page.
trans-unit.target: 获取 ASP.NET 应忽略呈现页时的设备标记的集合。

trans-unit.source: Device tags to ignore are specified as HTML namespace prefixes that should be passed as they are to the browser instead of being processed by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 若要忽略的设备标记被指定为 HTML 浏览器而不是所处理的 ASP.NET 的应传递的命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: An example is the `sys` prefix that is used for Microsoft Ajax elements.
trans-unit.target: 一个示例是`sys`用于 Microsoft Ajax 元素的前缀。

trans-unit.source: The collection of device tags that ASP.NET should ignore.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 应忽略的设备标记的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page scroll position should be maintained upon returning from a postback from the server.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应返回从来自服务器的回发时仍保持页滚动位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the page-scroll position should be maintained after postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应在回发; 后保留的页滚动位置否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the master page for the application.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对应用程序的母版页的引用。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property can be either a relative or an absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值可以是相对或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the master page for the application.
trans-unit.target: 对应用程序的母版页的引用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters that a single view-state field can contain.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置最大的单个视图状态字段可以包含的字符数。

trans-unit.source: Page and control view state is stored in hidden view-state fields when the page or control is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 呈现的页面或控件时，页和控件的视图状态存储视图状态的隐藏字段中。

trans-unit.source: If the length of the data stored exceeds the MaxPageStateFieldLength value, then the data is split between multiple view-state fields.
trans-unit.target: 如果存储的数据的长度超过 MaxPageStateFieldLength 值，然后将数据拆分多个视图状态字段之间。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters that a single view-state field can contain.
trans-unit.target: 最大单个视图状态字段可以包含的字符数。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixInfo> objects correspond to the `@ Import` directive on an ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixInfo>对象对应于`@ Import`指令将 ASP.NET 页上。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixInfo>

trans-unit.source: The `Import` directive allows you to specify namespaces that are automatically imported into all the pages of an application.
trans-unit.target: `Import`指令允许你指定自动导入到的应用程序的所有页的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceCollection"></xref> of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceCollection"></xref> of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.NamespaceInfo"></xref> objects.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies a code-behind class that .aspx pages inherit by default.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定.aspx 页在默认情况下继承的代码隐藏类。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies a code-behind class that .aspx pages inherit by default.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定.aspx 页在默认情况下继承的代码隐藏类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the parser filter type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定分析器筛选器类型。

trans-unit.source: A parser filter, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter> class, is called by the page compilation process before the parsing step to allow for changes to the source code at run time.
trans-unit.target: 分析器筛选器，这是实例的<xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter>类中，由页面编译进程在分析的步骤，以允许在运行时更改源代码之前调用。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter>

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the parser filter type.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定分析器筛选器类型。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the top of the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在窗体顶部呈现所有系统生成的隐藏的字段。

trans-unit.source: You can use the RenderAllHiddenFieldsAtTopOfForm property to specify that some system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the end of the form.
trans-unit.target: RenderAllHiddenFieldsAtTopOfForm 属性可用于指定某些系统生成的隐藏的字段将呈现在窗体的末尾。

trans-unit.source: In versions of ASP.NET earlier than the .NET Framework 3.5 SP1, ASP.NET renders some hidden fields (for example, `__VIEWSTATE`) at the top of the form.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 的之前版本.NET Framework 3.5 SP1，ASP.NET 呈现某些隐藏的字段 (例如， `__VIEWSTATE`) 窗体顶部。

trans-unit.source: Other hidden fields (for example, `__EVENTVALIDATION`) are rendered near the bottom of the form, just before the closing `` tag.
trans-unit.target: 其他隐藏的字段 (例如， `__EVENTVALIDATION`) 靠近底部的窗体上，只需在关闭之前呈现``标记。

trans-unit.source: By default, in ASP.NET 3.5 SP1, all system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在 ASP.NET 3.5 SP1 中，在页面顶部呈现所有系统生成的隐藏的字段。

trans-unit.source: This makes sure that the information in these fields is sent to the server even if a postback is performed before the page has finished loading.
trans-unit.target: 这样可以确保，即使之前页面加载完毕执行回发到服务器发送这些字段中的信息。

trans-unit.source: If RenderAllHiddenFieldsAtTopOfForm is set to `false`, performing a postback before the page has finished loading can cause an "Invalid postback or callback argument" error.
trans-unit.target: 如果 RenderAllHiddenFieldsAtTopOfForm 设置为`false`，执行回发页面加载完毕之前可能会导致"回发或回调参数无效"错误。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although the property name indicates "all hidden fields," user-created hidden fields are not affected by settings for this property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 虽然属性名称指示"所有隐藏的域"，用户创建隐藏的字段不受此属性的设置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the top of the form; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果窗体; 顶部呈现系统生成的隐藏的字段否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether smart navigation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用智能导航。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if smart navigation is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果启用了智能导航功能;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of an ASP.NET style sheet theme.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 ASP.NET 样式表主题的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of an ASP.NET style sheet theme.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 样式表主题的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixInfo> object has no corresponding directive on an ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixInfo>对象具有将 ASP.NET 页上没有相应的指令。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixInfo> objects allow you to remap tag type names to other type names at compile time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixInfo>对象允许你在编译时重新映射到其他类型名称的标记类型名称。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagPrefixInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TagMapCollection"></xref> of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TagMapCollection"></xref> of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo"></xref> objects.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of an ASP.NET page theme.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 ASP.NET 页面主题的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of an ASP.NET page theme.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 页面主题的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies a code-behind class that user controls inherit by default.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定用户控件在默认情况下继承的代码隐藏类。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies a code-behind file that user controls inherit by default.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定用户控件在默认情况下继承的代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether ASP.NET examines input from the browser for dangerous values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，确定是否 ASP.NET 检查来自浏览器的危险值的输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本利用概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Request validation is performed by comparing all input data to a list of potentially dangerous values.
trans-unit.target: 通过比较所有输入的数据的潜在危险值列表与执行请求验证。

trans-unit.source: If a match occurs, ASP.NET raises an <xref:System.Web.HttpRequestValidationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果出现匹配项，ASP.NET 将引发<xref:System.Web.HttpRequestValidationException>.</xref:System.Web.HttpRequestValidationException>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if ASP.NET examines input from the browser for dangerous values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 ASP.NET 检查来自浏览器的危险值; 输入否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encryption mode that ASP.NET uses when maintaining <xref uid="langword_csharp_ViewState" name="ViewState" href=""></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在维护时，将使用 ASP.NET 的加密模式<xref uid="langword_csharp_ViewState" name="ViewState" href=""></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The possible <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A> enumeration values are `Always`, `Auto`, and `Never`.
trans-unit.target: 可能<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>枚举的值为`Always`， `Auto`，和`Never`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value is `Auto`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `Auto`。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A> property is set to `Auto`, `ViewState` will be encrypted when a control requests it.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>属性设置为`Auto`，`ViewState`时控件请求它。 将加密</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode"></xref> enumeration value indicating when the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ViewState" name="ViewState" href=""></xref> values are encrypted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode"> </xref>枚举值，该值指示当<xref uid="langword_csharp_ViewState" name="ViewState" href=""></xref>值进行了加密。
